text: 9.4: Kis 4.22; 9.4; Lo 7.6; 14.1-2; FG 3.25; 13.22; Ef 2.12; Hi 8.8-10; 9.1Mbe Isreriŋ, Fhe Bakɨme mben won kaman fagim, mbe anan tari ma. Mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨme phorgap ana zɨ bakɨme vhen kav, vhɨra ana ŋkasŋka gangi. Fhe Bakɨme mbe phorga suaŋgiap ana won tɨvir mbe nɨɨŋgi. Ana vhɨra won rotur muunga tɨvar mbe khɨvigi. Ana vhɨra wo muunga bigi, ana ntan mbe phorga suaŋgi kameŋ, ana za ntan mbe suaŋgi.
